name: jyk_Children's_Famine
description:
In my country, Ecuador, there are many children asking for money, food, drinks, help, love. In this game they will ask you the same thing, you must strive to get it and give it to you / En mi país, Ecuador, hay muchos niños pidiendo dinero, comida, bebidas, ayuda, amor. En este juego te pediran lo mismo, tu debes esforzarte conseguirlo y darselo

This game is composed of programming, level design, 3D designs (made by Jacobo A Mena P - Jayikho), music and voice (Claudia Modarelli). It started 4 hours late than planned, but it was done with love and stress. Contact Us Whatsapp +593983519881, Discord Jayikho-5122, elavamor@icloud.com. CC type license.

Este juego esta compuesto de programacion, diseño de nivel, diseños 3D (realizado por Jacobo A Mena P - Jayikho), musica y voz (Claudia Modarelli). Se inicio 4 horas tarde de lo planificado, pero se lo hizo con amor y estres. Contactanos Whatsapp +593983519881,  Discord Jayikho#5122, elavamor@icloud.com. Licencia tipo CC.
